id.title: unique identifier for a form element

:type.title: A hint to the rendering engine for rendering custom components.

locale.title: Locale for the object
locale.description: Specifies the locale attribute for the object.

access.title: Access for the object
access.description: Specifies the access attribute for the object.

width.title: Width
width.description: Specifies the width for the object.

height.title: Height
height.description: Specifies the height for the object.

left.title: Left
left.description: Specifies the left attribute for the object.

top.title: Top
top.description: Specifies the top attribute for the object.

maxH.title: Maximum Height
maxH.description: Specifies the maximum height for the object.

minH.title: Minimum Height
minH.description: Specifies the minimum height for the object.

maxW.title: Maximum Width
maxW.description: Specifies the maximum width for the object.

minW.title: Minimum Width
minW.description: Specifies the minimum width for the object.

layout.title: Layout
layout.description: Specifies the layout for the object.

presence.title: Presence
presence.description: Specifies the presence attribute for the object.

useHref.title: Use Href
useHref.description: Specifies the use href for the object.

stock.title: Stock
stock.description: Specifies the stock for the object.

short.title: Short
short.description: Specifies the short for the object.

long.title: Long
long.description: Specifies the long for the object.

bind.title: Bind
bind.description: Specifies the bind for the object.

ref.title: Bind Reference
ref.description: Specifies the reference for the bind.

match.title: Bind Match
match.description: Specifies the match for the bind.

items.title: Items
items.description: Specifies the items for the object.

integers.title: Integers
integers.description: Specifies the integers for the items.

content.title: Integer Content
content.description: Specifies the content for the integer.

traversal.title: Traversal
traversal.description: Specifies the traversal for the object.

traverse.title: Traverse
traverse.description: Specifies the traverse for the traversal.

name.title: Event Name
name.description: Specifies the name for the event.

activity.title: Event Activity
activity.description: Specifies the activity for the event.

ref.title: Event Reference
ref.description: Specifies the reference for the event.

desc.title: Description
desc.description: Specifies the description for the object.

text.title: Text Description
text.description: Specifies the text description for the object.

content.title: Text Content
content.description: Specifies the content for the text.

breakBefore.title: Break Before
breakBefore.description: Indicates whether a break should occur before the object. This influences the layout and presentation of the object.

target.title: Break Before Target
target.description: Specifies the target for the break before.

targetType.title: Break Before Target Type
targetType.description: Specifies the target type for the break before.

startNew.title: Start New
startNew.description: Specifies whether a new page should start after the break before.

breakAfter.title: Break After
breakAfter.description: Indicates whether a break should occur after the object. This affects the layout and presentation of the object.

target.title: Break After Target
target.description: Specifies the target for the break after.

targetType.title: Break After Target Type
targetType.description: Specifies the target type for the break after.

startNew.title: Start New
startNew.description: Specifies whether a new page should start after the break after.

keep.title: Keep
keep.description: Specifies the keep for the object.

intact.title: Keep Intact
intact.description: Specifies whether the object should be kept intact.

next.title: Keep Next
next.description: Specifies whether the next object should be kept.

previous.title: Keep Previous
previous.description: Specifies whether the previous object should be kept.

assist.title: Assist
assist.description: Specifies the assist for the object.

role.title: Role
role.description: Specifies the role for the assist.

tooltip.title: Tooltip
tooltip.description: Specifies the tooltip for the assist.

content.title: Tooltip Content
content.description: Specifies the content for the tooltip.

speak.title: Speak
speak.description: Specifies the speak for the assist.

content.title: Speak Content
content.description: Specifies the content for the speak.

priority.title: Speak Priority
priority.description: Specifies the priority for the speak.

caption.title: Caption
caption.description: Specifies the caption for the object.

placement.title: Placement
placement.description: Specifies the placement for the caption.

reserve.title: Reserve
reserve.description: Specifies the reserve for the caption.

variables.title: Variables
variables.description: Specifies the variables for the object.

scripts.title: Scripts
scripts.description: Specifies the scripts for the variables.
